summary.para: Handles events that occur when the value of an animation variable changes.
This method receives updates as INT32 values. To receive updates as DOUBLE values, use the method.

param.name: storyboard
param.para: The storyboard that is animating the animation variable specified by the variable parameter.

param.name: variable
param.para: The animation variable that has been updated.

param.name: newValue
param.para: The new value of the animation variable, rounded according to the variable's rounding mode.

param.name: previousValue
param.para: The previous value of the animation variable, rounded according to the variable's rounding mode.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: The rounding mode for an animation variable is specified using the method.
OnIntegerValueChanged events might occur less frequently than events because values such as 2.2, 2.3, 2.4 would all be rounded to the same integer.
